subnet_ids.description: Returns a map of the subnet names to the subnet IDs.

virtual_network_id.description: Returns the ID of the virtual network.

virtual_network_name.description: Returns the name of the virtual network.

common_tags.description: (Optional) Tags to apply to all resources.

location.description: (Optional) Region for Azure resources, defaults to East US.

resource_group_name.description: (Optional) The name of the resource group to create the VNet in. Defaults to VNet name.

subnets.description: (Optional) Name and address space for subnets, defaults to subnet1 and 10.0.0.0/24.

vnet_address_space.description: (Optional) Address space for virtual network, defaults to 10.0.0.0/16.

vnet_name.description: (Required) The name of the virtual network.

app_port_number.description: (Optional) Port number for app. Defaults to 8000.

app_subnet.description: (Required) Name of subnet for app VM deployment. Must also be in keys from subnet_map.

business_unit_tag.description: (Optional) BU tag to apply to all resources.

common_tags.description: (Optional) Tags to apply to all resources.

location.description: (Optional) Region for Azure resources, defaults to East US.

organization_tag.description: (Optional) Org tag to apply to all resources.

subnet_map.description: (Required) Map of subnet names and address spaces.

vnet_address_space.description: (Required) Address space for the virtual network.
